faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to commonly asked questions about our platform

items.a: Mi Agent is a no-code platform that lets you easily build and deploy AI Agents for sales, customer support, and task automation — without writing a single line of code.

items.q: Do I need coding skills to use Mi Agent?
items.a: Not at all. Mi Agent is built for non-technical users. You can create an AI Agent in minutes using a simple drag-and-drop interface — no coding required.

items.q: Can the AI Agent learn from my documents?
items.a: Yes. You can upload PDFs, paste text, link to websites, or connect your Google Drive. Mi Agent will train the AI Agent based on your custom content.

items.q: What platforms does Mi Agent integrate with?
items.a: Mi Agent supports integration with websites, Facebook Messenger, Telegram, Zalo (coming soon), and internal systems via API or Webhooks.

items.q: What languages does the AI Agent support?
items.a: Mi Agent's AI Agents support multiple languages including English, Vietnamese, Spanish, German, French, and more. You can set a preferred language or let the AI auto-detect.
Your data is stored securely in encrypted cloud infrastructure, compliant with global standards like GDPR and ISO27001.

items.q: Can I try Mi Agent for free?
items.a: Yes. Mi Agent offers a free trial that gives access to essential features so you can build and launch your first AI Agent quickly.

items.q: How is Mi Agent different from other AI chatbot tools?
items.a: Mi Agent emphasizes fast deployment, no-code simplicity, private knowledge training, and a focus on small & medium businesses. You can go live in 5–10 minutes.
